Name: Cassandra's Fabulous Foray
About the game: 'Welcome, peasants to my fabulous story!' Cassandra exclaims. Watch and guide Her Grace, Cassandra Dawnstrider, 3rd Baroness and Grand Magistrix of New Haven in a western-themed fantasy visual novel. Help Cassandra defeat the evil villains Slippity Jim and the pompous hidalgo von Hohenstaufen as they try to bring law and order to the village of Malapais. With several branching endings, turn-based battles, and many opportunities to fail, can the daring Baroness survive?
